issue.title: [Rust] Parquet no longer builds
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9549](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9549). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I believe that there is a typo in `rust/parquet/Cargo.toml`:

it reads `arrow = { path = "../arrow", version = "1.0.0-SNAPSHOT", optional = true `}, but it should read `arrow = { path = "../arrow", version = "1.1.0-SNAPSHOT", optional = true `}, or the project does not compile.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9549?focusedCommentId=17164444) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
Thanks. See https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9537 for more information. There are scripts that update these versions. The scripts are under the "dev" folder and these will need updating.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9549?focusedCommentId=17164506) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
Issue resolved by pull request 7827
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/7827>
